recipe.title: Crimson Royale
ingredients: 12 tablespoons frozen cranberry juice cocktail concentrate, thawed
1 bottle champagne or other sparkling wine
instructions: Measure 2 tablespoons cranberry concentrate, 1 teaspoon cranberry liqueur and 1 teaspoon orange liqueur into each of 6 champagne flutes. Top with champagne. Thread 1 cranberry, 1 orange slice and then another cranberry onto each skewer. Place skewers atop glasses.
Measure 2 tablespoons cranberry concentrate, 1 teaspoon cranberry liqueur and 1 teaspoon orange liqueur into each of 6 champagne flutes. Top with champagne.
Thread 1 cranberry, 1 orange slice and then another cranberry onto each skewer. Place skewers atop glasses.
